allow-multiple-interfaces.help: Enable/disable multiple FortiLink interfaces for redundant connections between a managed FortiSwitch and FortiGate.
allow-multiple-interfaces.name: allow-multiple-interfaces

bounce-quarantined-link.help: Enable/disable bouncing (administratively bring the link down, up) of a switch port where a quarantined device was seen last. Helps to re-initiate the DHCP process for a device.
bounce-quarantined-link.name: bounce-quarantined-link

options.help: Disable bouncing (administratively bring the link down, up) of a switch port where a quarantined device was seen last.
options.name: disable

options.help: Enable bouncing (administratively bring the link down, up) of a switch port where a quarantined device was seen last.
options.name: enable

command-name.help: Name of custom command to push to all FortiSwitches in VDOM.
command-name.name: command-name

custom-command.help: List of custom commands to be pushed to all FortiSwitches in the VDOM.
custom-command.name: custom-command

default-virtual-switch-vlan.help: Default VLAN for ports when added to the virtual-switch.
default-virtual-switch-vlan.name: default-virtual-switch-vlan

https-image-push.help: Enable/disable image push to FortiSwitch using HTTPS.
https-image-push.name: https-image-push

options.help: Enable image push to FortiSwitch using HTTPS.
options.name: enable

options.help: Disable image push to FortiSwitch using HTTPS.
options.name: disable

log-mac-limit-violations.help: Enable/disable logs for Learning Limit Violations.
log-mac-limit-violations.name: log-mac-limit-violations

mac-aging-interval.help: Time after which an inactive MAC is aged out (10 - 1000000 sec, default = 300, 0 = disable).
mac-aging-interval.name: mac-aging-interval

mac-retention-period.help: Time in hours after which an inactive MAC is removed from client DB (0 = aged out based on mac-aging-interval).
mac-retention-period.name: mac-retention-period

mac-violation-timer.help: Set timeout for Learning Limit Violations (0 = disabled).
mac-violation-timer.name: mac-violation-timer

options.help: Quarantined device traffic is sent to FortiGate on a separate quarantine VLAN.
options.name: by-vlan

options.help: Quarantined device traffic is redirected only to the FortiGate on the received VLAN.
options.name: by-redirect

sn-dns-resolution.help: Enable/disable DNS resolution of the FortiSwitch unit's IP address by use of its serial number.
sn-dns-resolution.name: sn-dns-resolution

options.help: Enable DNS resolution of the FortiSwitch unit's IP address by use of its serial number.
options.name: enable

options.help: Disable DNS resolution of the FortiSwitch unit's IP address by use of its serial number.
options.name: disable

vlan-all-mode.help: VLAN configuration mode, user-defined-vlans or all-possible-vlans.
vlan-all-mode.name: vlan-all-mode

options.help: Enable VLAN optimization on FortiSwitch units for auto-generated trunks.
options.name: enable

options.help: Disable VLAN optimization on FortiSwitch units for auto-generated trunks.
options.name: disable
